title: Legal entity
description: Defines an organization representative as a legal entity

legalForm.title: Legal form
legalForm.description: The legal form associated to the organization

euid.title: EUID
euid.description: The EUID (European Unique Identifier) is a unique identification number assigned to entities, such as companies, registered in the European Union. It is structured according to the format: Country code, Identifier for national registry, dot(.), local identifier
